Documentation for Win32lib v0.70.18
Table of Contents

General Info

Some background and historical notes about win32lib.


The library was originally developed by David Cuny, and over time, a number of other people have made additions and corrections. Where appropriate the work that other people have contributed is marked thus... 
     -- Begin <person's name>
     -- End   <person's name>
This library provides access to the Window32 API from a fairly high level, hiding most of the guts from the user.

See also: Further Information
See Also: articles on win32lib, which may be considered as an alternate documentation
